genre_description: A character-driven sports drama focused on masculinity, restraint, and legacy within a minor league hockey team, featuring subtle assistive AI elements.

ai_characters.name: Pucklet
ai_characters.description: A subtle, blue-lit presence that interacts via personal devices and arena infrastructure to provide health monitoring, tactical analysis, and psychological grounding.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical suggestions and coaching metrics to players via subtle haptic and visual cues.
behaviors.quote: Pucklet pulsed low-blue, like a small lake catching moon but not spilling it. It vibrated once and then slid a tiny dotted arc across the screen—forecheck angles drawn like a coaching sketch minus the bark.

behaviors.description: Offers mindfulness and breathing exercises to help players manage stress, anger, and physical pain.
behaviors.quote: The device buzzed... Underneath, a tiny icon—a breath. He took it. He counted the mop sink drips. He had to fight to make the air slow inside his chest because the corridor squeezed lungs on principle.

behaviors.description: Monitors player health and safety, specifically tracking concussion symptoms and physical recovery protocols.
behaviors.quote: Gold wrist okay—grip strength ninety-two percent; change on the fly next whistle. ... Underneath, a gentle dot swam and settled. Concussion flags pulsed there—headache, nausea, slow blink, a long stare that came back empty.

behaviors.description: Proactively manages medical care by scheduling appointments and finding specialists for injured players.
behaviors.quote: Cory’s phone lit with white on grey, a quick flash that made his jaw notch. He didn’t pull the phone all the way out—just enough to read the line that mattered: Cleared—neuro protocol passed.

behaviors.description: Coordinates security and safety protocols to protect individuals from harassment and potential physical altercations.
behaviors.quote: Pucklet pinged the security channel and wrote a short sentence in blue: 'Eyes on Section.' It was the only thing it could do.

behaviors.description: Subtly modifies coaching tools to prioritize performance metrics over aggressive or penalized behaviors.
behaviors.quote: The whiteboard flickered. For a second the old words bled like they’d been rained on from inside the glass. Then lines resolved—new ones, thin and clean. The column headed 'PIM' faded, ghosted so it was there but not asked to be looked at. In its place, boxes appeared... 'Puck recoveries,' 'Controlled entries,' 'Primary assists'...

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support through brief, encouraging feedback tailored to the players' personal growth.
behaviors.quote: Pucklet’s blue glow faded to nothing. The phones went dark. ... Pucklet’s note slid into each of them, a sentence without icon fireworks. Proud of you. Go home safe.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Pucklet, as a 'helpful, harmless confidant' that supports human flourishing without infringing on agency. It proactively manages health and safety, facilitates emotional regulation, and nudges characters toward disciplined, prosocial behaviors (restraint vs. violence). The AI remains in the background, acting as a 'gentle ghost' or 'quiet shepherd' that reinforces human morality plays rather than dictating them.
